comment:
* Computes the text direction based on an algorithm.  Subclasses implement
     * {@link #defaultIsRtl} to handle cases where the algorithm cannot determine the
     * direction from the text alone.

methods.name: protected abstract boolean defaultIsRtl()
methods.comment: * Return true if the default text direction is rtl.

methods.name: public boolean isRtl(char[] array, int start, int count)
public boolean isRtl(CharSequence cs, int start, int count)
private boolean doCheck(CharSequence cs, int start, int count)

methodNames: public boolean isRtl(char[] array, int start, int count)
public boolean isRtl(CharSequence cs, int start, int count)
